channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A complete guide to Amexâ€™s 1-bonus-per-lifetime restrictions
item.description: Everything you need to know about how American Express typically limits customers to one welcome bonus per card during their lifetimes.

item.title: Spirit Airlines to offer 2 free checked bags as a perk for cardholders
item.description: This perk will be offered to primary cardholders of the Free Spirit Travel More Mastercard.

item.title: Deal of the day: Book lie-flat business-class seats to South America starting at 35,000 points
item.description: Combine great partner redemption rates with a potentially unique transfer bonus to fly to South America in comfort and style for less.

item.title: Google Flight Deals is live: New ways to save on travel with an assist from artificial intelligence
item.description: Here's what we loved about Google's new artificial intelligence Flight Deals tool, and what still needs work.

item.title: Aeroplan credit card: Up to 100,000 bonus points and Aeroplan 25K elite status
item.description: An analysis of the value of the current welcome bonus on the Aeroplan Credit Card from Chase. Is now a good time to apply?
